WRITING.TEXT: Thanks! i really play on simple colours to keep my chaos veiwable and to stand out ;)
Heh heh have to get kids into it... then i can relive samurai pizza cats, futureramma, duckman, brak, sealab etc ;)

I am setting up my site for a shop now. Private commissions at the moment but will rock def have prints, shirts etc asap. Best bet follow me on insta or join news letter etc (website is under updates)
In the pipeline... follow me in on insta or website (under update) and will get it happening.

Thanks for the love guys. This is my therapy and meditative time. Art and music... I love mixing sub conscious spontaneous drawing and considered design. Please check out some more on my instagram account https://www.instagram.com/dunehaggar

Cheers man, I am too fussy to see these hand drawn ines shredded and the laser etched ones are to 'frictiony'. I am waiting until i get printed versions with some good clear coats on it first before I sekl any i advertise as skateable... keep in touch via instagram etc and i will keep you in loop ;) what shape do you skate?
